name: Cavern of Flight
description:
Content warning: spiders!
It has been rumoured that the cavern holds the secret to flight! Explore it, if you dare...

Originally made for Ludum Dare in 2016. I'm very proud of the result, although I cheated while making it by using some pre-made code and spending more time on the project than allowed by the competition. The game had some nasty bugs and I thought it'd make sense to re-release it on itch with fixes to those.
